title: Science needs girls too
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Sabina Baltrukomis and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
brief_description: A program featuring Leonie Gianetto, Ursula Groves and Ann Osman from the McClintock Collective and students from Swinburne Community School and Swinburne Technical School who examine ways in which girls can be encouraged to take a more active part in the sciences.
creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Spencer, Sabina Baltrukomis and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
